attributes.action: Remove paedophiles from living in close proximity to children and schools.
attributes.additional_details:
Rhos man downloaded more than 800 indecent images
Published date: 03 May 2016 | 
Published by: Staff reporter
http://www.leaderlive.co.uk/news/161583/rhos-man-downloaded-more-than-800-indecent-images.aspx
attributes.background: Having recently read in the paper of an offender who is living on the same street as me.  It has become worrying that after pleading guilty to the crime he continued to live amongst us for over a year before rest of the street knew about it! And I thought how many more examples are there??

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law to introduce restrictions on where convicted pedophiles can live.
